Placed on Union Calendar No: 46.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Passed House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate, read twice. Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 265.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Cleared for White House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 99-375.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment

official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for nongame fish and wildlife conservation during fiscal years 1986, 1987, and 1988.

summary.text: Amends the Fish and Wildlife Conservation Act of 1980 to extend the authorization of appropriations through FY 1988 for State nongame fish and wildlife conservation plans.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for nongame fish and wildlife conservation during fiscal years 1986, 1987, and 1988.
